mapper.insert: insert into w_premcal_detail (quote_no, email, agmtkind, bldtotlyrnum, hsarea, lsgccd, polestrc, roofstrc, otwlstrc, objcat, bldfloors1, bldfloors2, lobzcd, gitdtarifcat1, objtypcd1, objtypcd2, objtypcd3, elagorgninsdamt1, elagorgninsdamt2, elagorgninsdamt3, ptykornm, telcat, telno, ptybiznm, bizno, objonnaddrcat, objzip, objaddr1, objaddr2, objroadnmcd, objtrbdcd, objtrbdaddr, partnerno, tpymprem, perprem, govtprem, lgovtprem, applno, scno, insert_date, purpose) values (#{quote_no}, #{email}, #{agmtkind}, #{bldtotlyrnum}, #{hsarea}, #{lsgccd}, #{polestrc}, #{roofstrc}, #{otwlstrc}, #{objcat}, #{bldfloors1}, #{bldfloors2}, #{lobzcd}, #{gitdtarifcat1}, #{objtypcd1}, #{objtypcd2}, #{objtypcd3}, #{elagorgninsdamt1}, #{elagorgninsdamt2}, #{elagorgninsdamt3}, #{ptykornm}, #{telcat}, #{telno}, #{ptybiznm}, #{bizno}, #{objonnaddrcat}, #{objzip}, #{objaddr1}, #{objaddr2}, #{objroadnmcd}, #{objtrbdcd}, #{objtrbdaddr}, #{partnerno}, #{tpymprem}, #{perprem}, #{govtprem}, #{lgovtprem}, #{applno}, #{scno}, sysdate, #{purpose})
